quizDescription: Combine famous movie titles and guess the hilarious mashup titles!

questions.question: Jurassic Park + The Terminator = ?
questions.explanation: When you combine 'Jurassic Park' and 'The Terminator,' you get 'The Parkinator'!

questions.question: Forrest Gump + The Matrix = ?
questions.explanation: The mashup of 'Forrest Gump' and 'The Matrix' is 'Forrest Matrix'!

questions.question: Pirates of the Caribbean + Star Wars = ?
questions.explanation: When pirates sail into 'Star Wars,' you get 'Pirates of the Galaxy'!

questions.question: The Lord of the Rings + Harry Potter = ?
questions.explanation: When you mix 'The Lord of the Rings' and 'Harry Potter,' you get 'The Potter of the Rings'!

questions.question: The Dark Knight + Finding Nemo = ?
questions.explanation: When Batman goes underwater, you get 'The Dark Fish' instead of 'The Dark Knight'!
